text: These Vermonters are taking a thoughtful approach to building a healthier, more resilient food system. It's exciting to see what collaboration, dedication, and Vermont creativity can accomplish. https://t.co/nzd331IaNi

The numbers are clear: Americans want Congress to end the gun violence crisis. 

I urge all of my colleagues - Democrats, Republicans and Independents - to come together to enact common-sense gun legislation. https://t.co/8d28eel2LQ

Gun violence is the number one cause of death for American kids. 

Our kids are scared, and they're fed up with inaction. It's time for Congress to take action to prevent gun violence. https://t.co/ePd2vlZI4e

This is big. @POTUS's executive action will boost American manufacturing, create good jobs, and protect our environment. That's a winning combination.

And there's more to be done. We have to keep working to deliver American-made clean energy. https://t.co/PJ8EtbbpXa

Far too many lives have been lost to gun violence in America. It’s heartbreaking and it’s unacceptable. As we mark Gun Violence Awareness Day, I am taking a moment to honor the victims of gun violence and I am committed to continue fighting to #EndGunViolence. https://t.co/5ZbazjgujT

I joined @GovPhilScott to celebrate two incredible Vermont companies this week: ReArch and OnLogic. These folks are creating jobs and building infrastructure across the Green Mountain State, and I wish them the best of luck on their new project. https://t.co/5Jw4P8Bpqq

There have been 233 mass shootings in the United States this year. That's 233 too many. 

Effective gun violence prevention policy is long overdue. I'm committed to staying in this fight until no family has to fear gun violence in their community.

I visited @kore_power in Waterbury last week to learn about their work on renewable energy storage. Reliable energy storage is a critical part of the clean energy transition, and I applaud Kore Power for the important work they’re doing right here in Vermont. https://t.co/hyQL7T7wsr

Vermont has long been at the forefront of the fight for LGBTQ+ rights. This #PrideMonth, we celebrate the history and vibrancy of the LGBTQ+ community and recommit ourselves to the fight for equality and respect for all. Happy Pride!
